Package gui.UserManagementScreens

Class TableCustomer

java.lang.Object
common.connectivity.User
common.connectivity.Customer
gui.UserManagementScreens.TableCustomer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TableCustomer extends Customer
The TableCustomer class is a subclass of the Customer class and represents a customer who is seated at a table. It contains additional information about the customer's status, represented by a ChoiceBox.
Author:
Lior
